/** Colors */
/** Font variables */
/** Mixins */
.hero-slider-active #block-gao-page-title { width: 100vw; position: relative; left: calc(-1 * (100vw - 100%) / 2); }

.hero-slider .media { display: block; }

.hero-slider .slick-dots { bottom: .5rem; }

.hero-slider .slick-dots:focus { outline: 5px auto -webkit-focus-ring-color; }

.hero-slider .slick-dots li button:before { display: none; }

.hero-slider .slick-dots li button { border: 0.125rem solid #C2D1D9; border-radius: 0.5rem; height: 0.625rem; opacity: 1; width: 0.625rem; }

.hero-slider .slick-dots li button:focus { outline: 5px auto -webkit-focus-ring-color; }

.hero-slider .slick-dots li.slick-active button, .hero-slider .slick-dots li button:hover, .hero-slider .slick-dots li button:focus { background-color: #99CCFF; border: 0.125rem solid #99CCFF; }

.hero-slider .slick-prev:focus, .hero-slider .slick-next:focus { outline: 5px auto -webkit-focus-ring-color; }

.hero-slider .slick-track { background-repeat: no-repeat; background-position: center; background-size: 100% 100%; height: 27rem; }

@media (max-width: 767.98px) { .hero-slider .slick-track { height: 29rem; } }

.hero-slider .slick-track .component-hero-slide__content { background-color: rgba(33, 33, 33, 0.7); height: 27rem; }

@media (max-width: 767.98px) { .hero-slider .slick-track .component-hero-slide__content { height: 29rem; } }

.hero-slider .component-hero-slide__content { padding: 5.75rem 1.75rem 0; }

@media (max-width: 767.98px) { .hero-slider .component-hero-slide__content { padding-top: 4.75rem; } }

.hero-slider .eyebrow-text { color: #99CCFF; font-size: 0.875rem; font-weight: 500; letter-spacing: 0.1rem; text-transform: uppercase; }

.hero-slider h2 { color: #FFFFFF; font-size: 2.6875rem; letter-spacing: 0.125rem; line-height: 4.375rem; max-width: 43.8125rem; margin: 1.75rem 0 2.5rem; word-wrap: break-word; }

.hero-slider .field--name-field-cta { text-align: left; }

.hero-slider .field--name-field-cta a { font-family: 'Lato'; font-weight: 400; border-radius: 2rem; border-style: solid; border-width: 1px; letter-spacing: 2px; padding: 0.5rem 3rem; text-decoration: none; text-transform: uppercase; letter-spacing: calc(1rem * .03); word-spacing: calc(1rem * .03); background-color: #E31C3D; border-color: #E31C3D; color: #FFFFFF; }

.hero-slider .field--name-field-cta a:active, .hero-slider .field--name-field-cta a .active, .hero-slider .field--name-field-cta a .is-active { border-radius: 2rem; }

@media screen and (max-width: 576px) { .hero-slider .field--name-field-cta a { letter-spacing: calc(0.75rem * .03); word-spacing: calc(0.75rem * .03); }
  .hero-slider .field--name-field-cta a:not(.subscribe):not(.clear-filters) { width: 100%; } }

.hero-slider .field--name-field-cta a:hover { background-color: #CD2026; border-color: #CD2026; color: #FFFFFF; }

.hero-slider .field--name-field-cta a:active, .hero-slider .field--name-field-cta a .active, .hero-slider .field--name-field-cta a .is-active { background-color: #981B1E; border-color: #981B1E; color: #FFFFFF; }

.hero-slider .field--name-field-cta a.disabled { border-color: #AEB0B5; }

.hero-slider .field--name-field-video { text-align: left; }

.hero-slider .field--name-field-video a { font-family: 'Lato'; font-weight: 400; border-radius: 2rem; border-style: solid; border-width: 1px; letter-spacing: 2px; padding: 0.5rem 3rem; text-decoration: none; text-transform: uppercase; letter-spacing: calc(1rem * .03); word-spacing: calc(1rem * .03); background-color: #E31C3D; border-color: #E31C3D; color: #FFFFFF; }

.hero-slider .field--name-field-video a:active, .hero-slider .field--name-field-video a .active, .hero-slider .field--name-field-video a .is-active { border-radius: 2rem; }

@media screen and (max-width: 576px) { .hero-slider .field--name-field-video a { letter-spacing: calc(0.75rem * .03); word-spacing: calc(0.75rem * .03); }
  .hero-slider .field--name-field-video a:not(.subscribe):not(.clear-filters) { width: 100%; } }

.hero-slider .field--name-field-video a:hover { background-color: #CD2026; border-color: #CD2026; color: #FFFFFF; }

.hero-slider .field--name-field-video a:active, .hero-slider .field--name-field-video a .active, .hero-slider .field--name-field-video a .is-active { background-color: #981B1E; border-color: #981B1E; color: #FFFFFF; }

.hero-slider .field--name-field-video a.disabled { border-color: #AEB0B5; }

.hero-slider .field--name-field-video a a:before { display: inline-block; content: ''; height: 18px; position: relative; top: 2px; width: 22px; margin-right: 1rem; }

.hero-slider .field--name-field-video a:after { display: inline-block; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; text-rendering: auto; -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased; font-family: 'Font Awesome 5 Free'; font-weight: 900; content: '\f144'; font-size: 1.15rem; margin-left: 1rem; position: relative; top: 0.05rem; }

@media (max-width: 767.98px) { .hero-slider h2 { font-size: 2.075rem; line-height: 3rem; }
  .hero-slider .component-hero-slide__content { padding: 1.75rem 2rem 0; }
  .hero-slider .field--name-field-cta, .hero-slider .field--remote-video { padding: .2rem; }
  .hero-slider .field--name-field-cta a:after, .hero-slider .field--remote-video a:after { margin-left: .5rem; top: 0; }
  .hero-slider .slick-arrow.slick-prev, .hero-slider .slick-arrow.slick-next { height: 0; overflow: hidden; width: 0; } }

@media (min-width: 576px) and (max-width: 991.98px) { .hero-slider .component-hero-slide__content { padding: 8.75rem 2rem 0; } }

@media (min-width: 576px) { .hero-slider h2 { font-size: 2.5rem; }
  .hero-slider .slick-dots { bottom: 0.3125rem; display: inline-block; z-index: 100; } }

@media (min-width: 768px) { .hero-slider .component-hero-slide__content { padding: 3.85rem 6.5rem 0; }
  .hero-slider .eyebrow-text { font-size: 1.35rem; }
  .hero-slider h2 { margin: 0.8125rem 0 2.0625rem; }
  .hero-slider .slick-arrow { background-color: transparent; display: block; height: 1.5rem; width: 1.5rem; }
  .hero-slider .slick-arrow:hover:before, .hero-slider .slick-arrow:focus:before { color: #99CCFF; }
  .hero-slider .slick-arrow:before { display: inline-block; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; text-rendering: auto; -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased; font-family: 'Font Awesome 5 Free'; font-weight: 900; font-size: 2rem; }
  .hero-slider .slick-arrow.slick-prev { left: 1.3125rem; z-index: 2; }
  .hero-slider .slick-arrow.slick-prev:before { content: '\f053'; }
  .hero-slider .slick-arrow.slick-next { right: 1.3125rem; }
  .hero-slider .slick-arrow.slick-next:before { content: '\f054'; } }

@media (min-width: 992px) { .hero-slider h2 { font-size: 3.625rem; }
  .hero-slider .component-hero-slide__content { padding: 3.85rem 8.375rem 0; } }

@media (max-width: 1199.98px) { .hero-slider .field--name-field-cta, .hero-slider .field--remote-video { text-align: center; } }
